    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sonce nad meglo</string>
            <string language="en">Sun above the fog</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne über dem Nebel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le soleil au-dessus du brouillard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sol acima da névoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sole sopra la nebbia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήλιος επάνω από την ομίχλη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sol sobre la niebla</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Čisto nebo nad megleno kotanjo kot posledica temperaturne inverzije.</string>
            <string language="en">Clear sky above the fogy basin as a result of a temperature inversion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nebo</string>
            <string language="en">sky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">megla</string>
            <string language="en">fog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kotlina</string>
            <string language="en">basin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">temperaturna inverzija</string>
            <string language="en">temperature inversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freier Himmel über dem Fogybassin resultierend 
aus einer Temperaturumstellung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ciel clair au-dessus du bassin de vieille galoche en 
raison d'une inversion de la température.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Céu desobstruído acima da bacia do fogy em 
conseqüência de um inversion da temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cielo libero sopra il bacino del fogy come 
conseguenza di un'inversione di temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σαφής ουρανός επάνω από τη fogy λεκάνη ως 
αποτέλεσμα μιας αντιστροφής θερμοκρασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cielo claro sobre el lavabo del fogy como 
resultado de una inversión de la temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Himmel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nebel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bassin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
